formula.name: IsNull
formula.description: Returns true if the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex has a null value.

formula.name: IsNotNull
formula.description: Returns true if the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex has a non-null value.

formula.name: SetNull
formula.description: Sets the value of a field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex to 'null'.

formula.name: GetBoolean
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'boolean'.

formula.name: SetBoolean
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'boolean'.

formula.name: GetVariant
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object as a variant. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'variant'.

formula.name: GetFacets
formula.description: Returns the facets value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'map'.

formula.name: SetVariant
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'variant'.

formula.name: GetChar
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'char'.

formula.name: SetChar
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'char'.

formula.name: GetInt
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'int'.

formula.name: SetInt
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'int'.

formula.name: GetString
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'String'.

formula.name: SetString
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'String'.

formula.name: GetSection
formula.description: Returns the section indicated by secNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'DataObjectSection'.

formula.name: GetSection
formula.description: Returns the section.

formula.name: GetObject
formula.description: Returns the object indicated by objNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'DataObject'.

formula.name: GetDouble
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'double'.

formula.name: SetDouble
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'double'.

formula.name: GetLong
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'long'.

formula.name: SetLong
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should of type 'long'.

formula.name: GetFloat
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'float'.

formula.name: SetFloat
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'float'.

formula.name: GetDate
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'Date'.

formula.name: SetDate
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'Date'.

formula.name: GetISODate
formula.description: Returns the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The return type is 'Date'.

formula.name: SetISODate
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'Date'.

formula.name: GetBigInteger
formula.description: Returns the big integer value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section).

formula.name: SetBigInteger
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'BigInteger'.

formula.name: GetBigDecimal
formula.description: Returns the big decimal value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section).

formula.name: SetBigDecimal
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'BigDecimal'.

formula.name: GetScaledDecimal
formula.description: Returns the saled decimal value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex from the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section).

formula.name: SetScaledDecimal
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'BigDecimal'.

formula.name: GetBinary
formula.description: Returns the binary value (byte array) of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndexfrom the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section).

formula.name: SetBinary
formula.description: Sets the value of the field indicated by fieldNameOrIndex in the given object. The object should be a data object (element of a section). The value should be of type 'byte[]'.

formula.name: GetFieldCount
formula.description: Returns the number of fields in the given data object.

formula.name: GetFieldIndex
formula.description: Returns the index of the field with the specified name in the given data object. It returns -1 if the field with the specified name is not found.

formula.name: GetFieldName
formula.description: Returns the name of the field at the specified index in the given data object. It returns empty string if there is no field at the specified index.

formula.name: GetFieldType
formula.description: Returns the type of the field at the specified index in the given data object. It returns empty string if there is no field at the specified index.

formula.name: GetFieldId
formula.description: Returns the ID field at the specified index in the given data object. If fieldNameOrIndexOpt is not specified returns the fieldId of this object/section

formula.name: GetFieldAt
formula.description: Returns the id of the field/section at the specified location in the given data object. For this method to work, the data object should have been obtained from a parser with 'locationInfo' enabled. This function returns empty string if there is no field at the specified location or if location info is not available. Note that the line and column parameters should have a minimum value of 1.

formula.name: FieldIdToFieldName
formula.description: Converts the field id to the field name by stripping off array accessors.

formula.name: FieldIdToXPath
formula.description: Converts the field id to the XPath.

formula.name: FieldIdEquals
formula.description: Returns true if the field ids are the same.

formula.name: GetCanonicalFieldId
formula.description: Converts the field id to its canonical form (that is always containing array indices).

formula.name: AddComment
formula.description: Adds comment to specified field or section. nameOrIndex refers to the field's name or index to which this comment will be associated with. If left out the comment is associated with the object itself.

formula.name: AddComment
formula.description: Comment is associated with the object.

formula.name: GetComments
formula.description: Gets the comments associated with an object or a field in the DataObject as a StringList.

formula.name: GetExceptionProperty
formula.description: Returns the value of the property with the specified key in the exception object. If the specified property is not available, empty string is returned.

formula.name: SetExceptionProperty
formula.description: Adds an arbitrary key/value "property" to the exception object. The property can be accessed using getExceptionProperty function.

formula.name: GetStackTrace
formula.description: Returns the stack trace of the exception object as a String

formula.name: GetMessage
formula.description: Returns the exception message from the exception object

formula.name: GetCause
formula.description: Returns the cause of the exception as a String

formula.name: GetCause
formula.description: Returns the cause of the exception as a String. The stack trace of the cause will be included based on the selection of includeStackTrace variable

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Converts the exception object to text

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Converts the exception object to text. Includes the stack trace in the text based on the selection of includeStackTrace variable

formula.name: GetCascadedExceptions
formula.description: Returns a collection containing the cascaded exceptions for the given exception. The collection can be iterated using foreach construct. Each element in the collection is an Exception Object with same set of fields as TransformException

formula.name: AddCascadedExceptions
formula.description: Adds/cascades the exception (toAddEx) to the target exception and returns a collection containing the cascaded exceptions for the given exception. The collection can be iterated using foreach construct. Each element in the collection is an Exception Object with same set of fields as TransformException

formula.name: RemoveCascadedExceptions
formula.description: Removes the exception from target exception. The collection can be iterated using foreach construct. Each element in the collection is an Exception Object with same set of fields as TransformException

formula.name: CreateException
formula.description: Creates a exception object with specified message

formula.name: ThrowException
formula.description: Throws the exception

formula.name: GetBatchException
formula.description: Returns the exception encountered while parsing the given record of the batch. This function can be used within a BatchParse activity to get the exceptions associated with current record

formula.name: GetBatchObject
formula.description: Returns the object associated with the batch. This function can be used within a PhasedParse activity to get the object associated with current record

formula.name: GetBatchSection
formula.description: Returns the section that triggered this callback while parsing the given record of the batch. This function can be used within a PhasedParse activity to get the section associated with current record

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Returns the string representation of the object or primitive value.

formula.name: ToXML
formula.description: Returns the XML string representation of the object (same as ToText).

formula.name: FromXML
formula.description: Convert XML String to Section.

formula.name: ToJSON
formula.description: Returns the JSON string representation of the object.

formula.name: FromJSON
formula.description: Convert JSON String to Section

formula.name: Equal
formula.description: Returns true if obj1 equals obj2, returns false otherwise.

formula.name: NotEqual
formula.description: Returns true if obj1 not equals obj2, returns false otherwise.

formula.name: GetParentSection
formula.description: Returns the parent section of this object or section. The return type is 'DataObjectSection'.

formula.name: GetParentObject
formula.description: Returns the parent object of this object or section. The return type is 'DataObject'.

formula.name: GetParentObjectTyped
formula.description: Returns the parent object of this object or section. The return type is a typed 'DataObject'.

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Returns the string representation of the object or primitive value.
